word: The pure in heart live as in the visible presence of God during the time He apportions them in this world. And they will also see Him face to face in the future, immortal state, as did Adam when he walked and talked with God in Eden. "Now we see through a glass, darkly; but then face to face" (1 Corinthians 13:12).--Thoughts From the Mount of Blessing, pp. 24-27.
